source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'OPS_OPERATION_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Operation]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Period_Date as timestamp,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Perpetual_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Current_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Future_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Forecast_Type as string,
		Version_name as string,
		UOM as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT \n --REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS REF_ASSET_OFFSET , PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS PAR_ASSET_OFFSET, PAR.DESC_YEAR, DAT.PERIOD,\n CASE WHEN REF.ASSET_OFFSET = PAR.ASSET_OFFSET \n          THEN DATEADD(YEAR,CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)+( CAST(DAT.PERIOD AS INT) - 1 ),CAST(CONCAT(PAR.DESC_YEAR,\'-01-01\') AS DATETIME)) \n          ELSE DATEADD(YEAR,CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)-CAST(PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)+( CAST(DAT.PERIOD AS INT) - 1 ),CAST(CONCAT(PAR.DESC_YEAR,\'-01-01\') AS DATETIME)) \n END AS Period_Date,\n REF.FUND_ID AS Fund_ID,\n REF.ASSET_ID AS Asset_ID,\n DAT.STATUS AS Status, \n DAT.PRODUCT AS Product, \n CASE WHEN PRD.GL_CODE IS NULL THEN \'IGNORE\' ELSE PRD.GL_CODE END AS GL_Code,\n CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(100)) AS Cash_Flow_Code,\n ABS(( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) )) AS Perpetual_Amount,\n CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) AS Current_Amount, \n CAST(CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) AS Future_Amount,\n CASE WHEN UPPER(COA.DEBIT_CREDIT) = \'DR\' AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) >= 0 THEN \'DR\'\n      WHEN UPPER(COA.DEBIT_CREDIT) = \'DR\' AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) < 0 THEN \'CR\'\n	  WHEN UPPER(COA.DEBIT_CREDIT) = \'CR\' AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) >= 0 THEN \'CR\'\n	  WHEN UPPER(COA.DEBIT_CREDIT) = \'CR\' AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) < 0 THEN \'DR\'\n	  WHEN COA.DEBIT_CREDIT IS NULL AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) >= 0 THEN \'DR\'\n	  ELSE \'CR\'\n END AS Debit_Credit,\n-- CASE WHEN ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) >= 0 THEN \'DR\' ElSE \'CR\' END AS Debit_Credit,\n \'Forecast\' AS Forecast_Type,\n REF.VERSION_NAME AS Version_name,\n DAT.UOM\nFROM RELATIONAL.FORECAST_ASSET_REFERENCE REF\nJOIN STAGING.FORECAST_PARAM PAR\nON REF.FUND_ID = PAR.FUND_ID AND REF.ASSET_ID = PAR.ASSET_ID AND REF.VERSION_NAME = PAR.VERSION_NAME \nJOIN STAGING.FORECAST_DATA DAT\nON REF.FUND_ID = DAT.FUND_ID AND REF.ASSET_ID = DAT.ASSET_ID AND REF.VERSION_NAME = DAT.VERSION_NAME \nLEFT JOIN RELATIONAL.FORECAST_GL_PRODUCT_MAP PRD\nON DAT.FUND_ID = PRD.FUND_ID AND DAT.ASSET_ID = PRD.ASSET_ID AND DAT.STATUS = PRD.STATUS AND DAT.PRODUCT = PRD.Product AND PRD.RECORD_DELETED_FLAG = 0\nLEFT JOIN RELATIONAL.CHART_OF_ACCOUNT COA\nON PRD.GL_CODE = COA.GL_CODE AND COA.RECORD_DELETED_FLAG = 0\nWHERE REF.ISPROCESSED = 0 AND REF.RECORD_DELETED_FLAG = 0 \nAND DAT.STATUS != \'\' AND DAT.STATUS IS NOT NULL\nAND CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT) >= CAST(PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)\n--AND CAST(DAT.PERIOD AS INT) >= CASE WHEN (CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT) - CAST(PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)) = 0 \n--    THEN 1 ELSE (CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT) - CAST(PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)) END',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB
StagingDB select(mapColumn(
		Period_Date,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Perpetual_Amount,
		Current_Amount,
		Future_Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Forecast_Type,
		Version_name,
		UOM
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
AddAuditColumns alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(0))) ~> AlterRowInsert
AlterRowInsert sink(input(
		Period_Date as timestamp,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Perpetual_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Current_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Future_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Forecast_Type as string,
		Version_name as string,
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string,
		UOM as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Period_Date,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Perpetual_Amount,
		Current_Amount,
		Future_Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Forecast_Type,
		Version_name,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		UOM
	)) ~> InsertUpdateRow

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Operation_Id as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Area_Treated as string,
		Treatment_Cost as string,
		Unit_Cost as string,
		Last_Age_Class_Date as string,
		Species_Survived as string,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Operation_Id as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Area_Treated as decimal(19,4),
		Treatment_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Last_Age_Class_Date as date,
		Species_Survived as string,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate as decimal(5,2),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalOperation
GenerateStagingChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Operation_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,
		StagingChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectStagingData
SelectNewRecordData derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
RelationalOperation derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Operation_Type_Code,Area_Treated,Treatment_Cost,Unit_Cost,Last_Age_Class_Date,Species_Survived,Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate)) ~> GenerateRelationalChecksum
GenerateRelationalChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Operation_Id = Operation_Id,
		Relation_Reporting_Period = Reporting_Period,
		Relation_Operation_Type_Code = Operation_Type_Code,
		Relation_Area_Treated = Area_Treated,
		Relation_Treatment_Cost = Treatment_Cost,
		Relation_Unit_Cost = Unit_Cost,
		Relation_Last_Age_Class_Date = Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Relation_Species_Survived = Species_Survived,
		Relation_Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate = Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,
		Relation_Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime,
		Relation_Update_Datetime = Update_Datetime,
		Relation_Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalData
ConvertDatesAndIdAndNumbers derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Operation_Type_Code,Area_Treated,Treatment_Cost,Unit_Cost,Last_Age_Class_Date,Species_Survived,Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate)) ~> GenerateStagingChecksum
SelectStagingData, SelectRelationalData lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Operation_Id == Relation_Operation_Id,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> CompareKeys
AddAuditColumns, SelectChangeRecord union(byName: true)~> UnionNewAndExisting
NewAndExistingOperation@NewOperation select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Operation_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewRecordData
UnionNewAndExisting alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
StagingDB derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Last_Age_Class_Date = toDate(Last_Age_Class_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Operation_Id = toInteger(Operation_Id),
		Area_Treated = toDecimal(Area_Treated, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Treatment_Cost = toDecimal(Treatment_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Unit_Cost = toDecimal(Unit_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate = toDecimal(Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate, 5, 2, "###.##")) ~> ConvertDatesAndIdAndNumbers
CompareKeys split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewAndExistingOperation@(NewOperation, ChangedOperation, ExistingNoChange)
NewAndExistingOperation@ChangedOperation derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> ChangedAddAuditData
ChangedAddAuditData select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Operation_Id = Relation_Operation_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,
		insert_datetime = Relation_Insert_Datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectChangeRecord
AlterRowUpsert sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Operation_Id as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Area_Treated as decimal(19,4),
		Treatment_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Last_Age_Class_Date as date,
		Species_Survived as string,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate as decimal(5,2),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Operation_Id'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Operation_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,
		Insert_Datetime = insert_datetime,
		Update_Datetime = update_datetime,
		Process_Name = process_name
	)) ~> UpserttRow

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Operation_Id as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Area_Treated as string,
		Treatment_Cost as string,
		Unit_Cost as string,
		Last_Age_Class_Date as string,
		Species_Survived as string,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
source(output(
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Operation_Type as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalOperationType
ValidatedDerivedData@ValidDerivedData, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationAsset
IsValidOperationType@ValidOperationType select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Operation_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
DerivedFields split(not(isNull(Derived_Operation_Id)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && 
iif(not(isNull(Area_Treated)),not(isNull(Derived_Area_Treated)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Treatment_Cost)),not(isNull(Derived_Treatment_Cost)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Unit_Cost)),not(isNull(Derived_Unit_Cost)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate)),not(isNull(Derived_Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Last_Age_Class_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Last_Age_Class_Date)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedDerivedData@(ValidDerivedData, InvalidDerivedData)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Last_Age_Class_Date = toDate(Last_Age_Class_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Operation_Id = toInteger(Operation_Id),
		Derived_Area_Treated = toDecimal(Area_Treated, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Treatment_Cost = toDecimal(Treatment_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Unit_Cost = toDecimal(Unit_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate = toDecimal(Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate, 5, 2, "###.##")) ~> DerivedFields
InvalidDerivedDataErrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Operation_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDerivedData
ValidatedDerivedData@InvalidDerivedData derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Operation ID / Area Treated / Treatment Cost / Unit Cost / Last Age Class Date / Last Age Class Survival Rate")) ~> InvalidDerivedDataErrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Operation_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDerivedData, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset, SelectInvalidOperationType union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset, SelectRelationalOperationType lookup(Operation_Type_Code == Relation_Operation_Type_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalOperationType
RelationalOperationType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Operation_Type_Code = Operation_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalOperationType
LookupRelationalOperationType split(not(isNull(Relation_Operation_Type_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidOperationType@(ValidOperationType, InvalidOpeartionType)
IsValidOperationType@InvalidOpeartionType derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Operation Type Code")) ~> InvalidOperationTypeErrormessage
InvalidOperationTypeErrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Operation_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidOperationType
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Operation_Id as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Area_Treated as string,
		Treatment_Cost as string,
		Unit_Cost as string,
		Last_Age_Class_Date as string,
		Species_Survived as string,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Operation_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB
